# Vehicle type
<!--- THIS FILE IS GENERATED PLEASE DO NOT EDIT IT DIRECTLY --->

A vehicle type allows vehicles to be categorized according to their characteristics.

<OH code="carType"/>




## Required Properties {#properties-mandatory}
    
### Code {#code}

The unique vehicle type code

*Technical name:* ```code```
<PH code="carType:code"/>

### Color {#color}

The color associated with the vehicle type for display

*Technical name:* ```color```
<PH code="carType:color"/>

### Last name {#name}

The name of the vehicle type

*Technical name:* ```name```
<PH code="carType:name"/>

    





## Associated entities (list) {#properties-has-many}

### Vehicles {#cars}

A vehicle allows you to manage information related to a vehicle

*Technical name:* ```cars```
